details.title: good
details.desc: it is a great game to play with friends. its completely outdoor and you don't walk a lot. it helps to pay attention to historical buildings. the game took arround 2 hours

details.title: We love it
details.desc:
It was really interesting!!!
I did this quest with my sister and we spent about an hour and a half solving all the puzzles and I learned a lot of new things about the history of Istanbul 
It was a bit hard to navigate in the evening so I recommend to do it at daytime
